name: Build, Shoot and Recover
description:
Shoot zombies, build to protect yourself, and try to survive in Build, Shoot, and Recover! WASD to move, aim with the mouse, left click to shoot zombies, right-click to build, scroll while in Build-mode to change material, from spikes to boxes. Boxes help stop the zombies(not for long, though), while spikes damage the zombies AND the player, so be careful. You can delete builds if you are out of material or shoot the boxes to make the process faster. Upgrade your gun to shoot from bullets to lasers, to explosives. Destroy trees to get wood and rocks to build spikes. Look at your stats to see from your firerate to your inventory. Finally, you can collect other upgrades for your firerate and bullet speed to upgrades for homing bullets.

*WARNING: This game may have browser errors, such as music not loading or sounds delaying. We were going to make this game downloadable, but the process was too complex to export it in time, so if you have any errors while playing this game, you can refresh the page or keep playing since the browser errors we discovered aren't going to ruin the experience, just miss a part of it*
